message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of simultaneous detection and segmentation of objects in images, which is a common task in computer vision. The paper proposes a novel approach that uses hierarchical structures and locality sensitive hashing to efficiently and accurately segment objects. This approach builds on recent work that utilizes convolutional neural networks for object detection. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Other likely sub-categories include cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval), as these sub-categories are also relevant to the problem of object segmentation in images.
